content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates; status: NO_FUEL with furnace_source holding 48 units of iron ore.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates; status: NO_INGREDIENTS with fuel inventory containing 2 units of coal and furnace_result holding 6 copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) configured with 10 automation science packs; status: NO_POWER, research set to automation, electrical_id updated to 8384.
- ElectricityGroup (id=8384) connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5) and (8.5, 6.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at position(2.5, 21.5) for power generation; final status: NOT_CONNECTED with warnings: ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"]; connection points at (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) producing steam; status: NO_FUEL with warning "out of fuel"; fluid_box holds ~200 units of water at 15°; connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); steam output at (-7.5, 24.5); fluid_system now set to [30724].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) extracting water; status: WORKING; connection point at (-9.5, 23.5); fluid_box holds 100 units of water at 15°; fluid_system now set to [30724].
- Pipeline Network consisting of:
  • PipeGroup at position(-6.5, 20.5) with fluid_system=30724 – status: WORKING.
  • PipeGroup at position(-2.5, 20.5) with fluid_system=30725 – status: EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 21.5) with fluid_system=30726 – status: EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(-3.5, 23.5) with fluid_system=30731 – status: EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(-7.5, 25.5) with fluid_system=30730 – status: EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(3.5, 25.5) with fluid_system=30735 – status: EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(2.5, 24.5) with fluid_system=30734 – status: EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 28.5) with fluid_system=30737 – status: EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Fluid System Identifier Mismatch:
  - Repeated unsuccessful connection attempts using fluid_system identifiers [30380, 30423, 30466, 30509, 30552, 30595, 30638, 30681] indicate the use of incorrect or outdated identifiers. Verify and use the current active fluid_system value from a working PipeGroup before initiating a connection.

• Rigid Pipeline Stabilization:
  - Fixed waiting periods (10 seconds) for pipeline stabilization introduce unnecessary delays. Replace static delays with dynamic connectivity checks to ensure readiness before proceeding.
